## Quaternion.RotationQuaternionFromAxis() method

Creates a new quaternion containing the rotation value to reach the target (axis1, axis2, axis3) orientation as a rotated XYZ system (axis1, axis2 and axis3 are normalized during this operation)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationQuaternionFromAxis(axis1: Vector3, axis2: Vector3, axis3: Vector3): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis1 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the first axis |
|  axis2 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the second axis |
|  axis3 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the third axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the new quaternion
